Flow.description: Updated to find the System User and sets it in the CreatedById field on Case

formulas.name: PostID
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS({!Post_Record_to_Save.SproutSocialApp__Post_URL__c}, 'posts/'), MID( {!Post_Record_to_Save.SproutSocialApp__Post_URL__c}, FIND('posts/', {!Post_Record_to_Save.SproutSocialApp__Post_URL__c}) + 6, FIND('?', {!Post_Record_to_Save.SproutSocialApp__Post_URL__c} & '?') - (FIND('posts/', {!Post_Record_to_Save.SproutSocialApp__Post_URL__c}) + 6) ), IF( CONTAINS({!Post_Record_to_Save.SproutSocialApp__Post_URL__c}, '.com/'), MID( {!Post_Record_to_Save.SproutSocialApp__Post_URL__c}, FIND('.com/', {!Post_Record_to_Save.SproutSocialApp__Post_URL__c}) + 5, LEN({!Post_Record_to_Save.SproutSocialApp__Post_URL__c}) - (FIND('.com/', {!Post_Record_to_Save.SproutSocialApp__Post_URL__c}) + 5) ), '' ) )

formulas.name: SocialMediaProfileID
formulas.expression: MID( {!Post_Record_to_Save.SproutSocialApp__Post_URL__c}, FIND('https://www.facebook.com/', {!Post_Record_to_Save.SproutSocialApp__Post_URL__c}) + LEN('https://www.facebook.com/'), FIND("/", {!Post_Record_to_Save.SproutSocialApp__Post_URL__c}, FIND('https://www.facebook.com/', {!Post_Record_to_Save.SproutSocialApp__Post_URL__c}) + LEN('https://www.facebook.com/')) - (FIND("https://www.facebook.com/", {!Post_Record_to_Save.SproutSocialApp__Post_URL__c}) + LEN('https://www.facebook.com/')) )
